title: Karin Hulshof
subtitle:
Asia is the home of 1 in 5 child migrants. As they migrate, children are at risk of being excluded or left behind. 

That’s why national child protection systems should be inclusive of all children – migrants/refugees or not – to protect the rights of every child #AChildIsAChildpic.twitter.com/4gprdDR8t4

title: போராளி பேராழி
subtitle:
What is CAA ?

"Citizenship Amendment Act 2019"

What is the purpose of the act, and what is the need?

To provide citizenship to refugees fled from neighbouring countries due to religious persecuation, and to recognize those refugees came to India post independence.

#CAASupportpic.twitter.com/IL7OnBGaHE
